boardgame.name: Thunderstone: Dungeons, Monster, reiche Beute!
Thunderstone: Starter Set
boardgame.description: In the Thunderstone line of deck-building games, you build a party of heroes to defeat the dreaded Thunderstone Bearers in their dungeons or in the wilderness. As the game progresses, you gain powerful weaponry and level into new and mighty hero classes. Your goal is to claim the best cards and survive to take the Thunderstone._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thunderstone: Starter Set includes just enough for new players to get started in the world of Thunderstone Advance, while also providing new hero, monster and village cards that experienced players can bring to their game. This introductory set includes an easy set-up designed to get people started on the game in minutes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Thunderstone_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Thunderstone Advance: Towers of Ruin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5023) Prepare your party for a quest to claim the Thunderstone! Hire brave heroes, equip them with weapons, prepare your spells, and delve into the dungeon. Each monster you slay brings you closer to victory-and the dreaded Thunderstone Bearer! Thunderstone: Starter Set provides everything for 2-5 players to kill monsters and search for the Thunderstone. The easy setup of this introductory set will have new players going in just a few minutes. Teach it to friends, or learn it together! This set includes all new heroes, monster groups, and village cards for experienced players as well.

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. THUNDERSTONE STARTER SET: $17.95 Alderac Entertainment Group [AEG 5023] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - $14.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - TBD

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5023) Prepare your party for a quest to claim the Thunderstone! Hire brave heroes, equip them with weapons, prepare your spells, and delve into the dungeon. Each monster you slay brings you closer to victory-and the dreaded Thunderstone Bearer! Thunderstone: Starter Set provides everything for 2-5 players to kill monsters and search for the Thunderstone. The easy setup of this introductory set will have new players going in just a few minutes. Teach it to friends, or learn it together! This set includes all new heroes, monster groups, and village cards for experienced players as well.
